content: --लक्षणा, --स्वार्था a kind of लक्षणा (also called लक्षणलक्षणा) in which a word loses its primary sense, but is used in one which is in some way connected with the primary sense; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} in the familiar instance गंगायां घोषः ‘a hamlet on the Ganges,’ गंगा loses its primary sense and means गंगातट; <ab>cf.</ab> अजहत्स्वार्था also. {2} irony.
